headline.print_headline: Nepal: Police Shoot at Protesters, Killing at Least 3
headline.main: Nepal: Police Shoot at Protesters, Killing at Least 3

snippet: The police fired on ethnic Madhesi protesters, part of a group that has been demanding changes to the Constitution, which they say dilutes their political voice.
lead_paragraph: The police fired on ethnic Madhesi protesters, part of a group that has been demanding changes to the Constitution, which they say dilutes their political voice.
